# Are you ready to scrape Premier League Player data for 2020/2021?

We are going to use Pandas to pull in tables from a URL. 
In this case we will grab goal data for 2020!
source.06b0418c:
Use the read_html method of the Pandas library to read the HTML tables

This script returns HTML tables into a list of DataFrame objects
source.8f16a340: This means there is one table on the page. To display that first table you insert a 0.
source.355fa35b: This script returns HTML tables into a list of DataFrame objects
